document.full_text: the wave of political change in the arab world has laid bare a generation gap in iraq that is split by old resentments nurtured by dictatorship and war and a youth that is now grasping for a stake in the new iraq.
document.title: at war: iraqi youths long for their own moment in the 'arab spring'
lines_and_colors: the wave of political change in the arab world has laid bare a generation gap in iraq that is split by old resentments nurtured by dictatorship and war and a youth that is now grasping for a stake in the new iraq.
